english.segment2: I made my mistakes. I seen my heart cave in. I got my scars. I been to hell and back again
english.segment3: Born for the blue skies. Well survive the rain. Born for the sunrise. Well survive the pain
english.segment4: [Chorus:]. Were singing . Hey, you cant count us out. Weve been running up against the crowd. Yeah, we are the dark horses. Were singing . Wait! Its not over now. Weve been down but weve never been out. Yeah, we are the dark horses
english.segment5: We found the way out. The city takes everything it can. But outside the crowds. I can feel my lungs again
english.segment6: Born for the blue skies. Well survive the rain. Born for the sunrise. Well survive the pain
english.segment8: We're singing. La la la la la la la. La la la la la la la.
english.segment10: Born for the blue skies. Born for the blue skies. Born for the sunrise. Well survive the pain
english.segment11: [Chorus:]. Were singing . Hey, you cant count us out. Weve been running up against the crowd. Yeah, we are the dark horses. Were singing . Wait, dont care what they say. We know well find a way. Yeah! We are the dark horses
english.segment14: [Faded Voice:]. Keep running with the dark horses. Hope makes the blood change courses. Keep running with the dark horses. Stand up with the dark horses. Keep running with the dark horses. Hope makes the blood change courses
